api_list.name: index
api_list.description:
Extract Fear & Greed index value(s)

Query params:
limit (NUMBER) - Get latest N records (Optional)
timestamp (STRING) - Get index value by UTC timestamp (Optional)

If no query params specified, all available history will be fetched.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit number of last N records

optional_parameters.name: timestamp
optional_parameters.description: Get fear & greed index value by specified utc timestamp
